channel.title: Rune-Heritage!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/4739/runeheritage.gif[/img][/center] [center]Project started 4/20/11[/center] [img]http://www.smfpersonal.net/famfamfam/user.png[/img] [b]Founder & Developer:[/b] [b]Flippy(Gurlz)[/b] [img]http://runeheritage.netau.net/adkportal/images/admin.png[/img] [b]Version/Protocal[/b] [b]474[/b] [img]http://runeheritage.netau.net/adkportal/images/admin.png[/img] [b]Realse Date:[/b] [b]Unknown[/b]
[center][img]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/5514/16177186.gif[/img][/center] [hr]
[left][b][u][size=18pt]Information:[/size][/u][/b][/left]
Welcome to my devolpment thread, this server is going to be based on hyperion, The protocal will be based on the 474 time in runescape, loading a acual 474 client, makeing hyperion load the 474 protocal too. I am going to make this a realistic emulator to runescape, meaning everything i do will be based on the 474 protocal of Rune-scape. My goals are to make all skills/minigames/interfaces/quests, based on Rune-Scape. I will try to make all the programing neat. The Server will be very stable, holding about prolly 1000+ no lag. My goals are to make a stable efficant econmy meaning the average amount of money will be 500k - 10m and not everyone haveing Godswords. If you have any suggestions please post them, Thanks for looking at my thread [left][b][u][size=18pt]Updates:[/size][/u][/b][/left]
[ul][li] Downloaded Hyperion (4/20/11) [/li] [li] Loaded 474 packets and made it connect [/li] [li] Started adding packets, dropping, picking up, etc [/li] [li] Loaded npcs, item deffintions etc [/li][/ul]
[left][b][u][size=18pt]Pictures:[/size][/u][/b][/left]

item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Ah… Just starting a development team. Use RuneSource or Hyperion, work on that, you’ll get more out of it than Project Insanity.
You can easily add those nicey-nice features in PI.

[left][size=18pt]Information:[/size][/left]

Welcome to my devolpment thread, this server is going to be based on hyperion, The protocal will be based on the 474 time in runescape, loading a acual 474 client, makeing hyperion load the 474 protocal too. I am going to make this a realistic emulator to runescape, meaning everything i do will be based on the 474 protocal of Rune-scape. My goals are to make all skills/minigames/interfaces/quests, based on Rune-Scape. I will try to make all the programing neat. The Server will be very stable, holding about prolly 1000+ no lag. My goals are to make a stable efficant econmy meaning the average amount of money will be 500k - 10m and not everyone haveing Godswords. If you have any suggestions please post them, Thanks for looking at my thread
